summary: Romantic multi-page website for boyfriend featuring a landing page with couple photo, a heart-button quiz (6‚Äì7 questions with yes/no branching responses), an animated tapping mini-game with Luna the chibi dino, and a final anniversary message reveal; branded for KBK&TC.com with footer credit 'created by Luna'.

existing_features.title: Create a multi-step single-page website flow with these sections in order: (1) Landing page, (2) Yes/No quiz (6‚Äì7 questions), (3) Mini-game intro with character, (4) 15-second tapping mini-game (50 taps goal), (5) Final heart button reveal with the full anniversary message.

Implement the Landing page with: (a) heading text exactly: "For my Love of my life Khambor B Kharjana", (b) display the uploaded couple image (IMG-20250222-WA0001.jpg), (c) show this exact text below the image: "I love you and will always Love you please click this heart button so that you can answer some questions", and (d) a heart-shaped button to begin the quiz.

Build a Yes/No quiz containing 6‚Äì7 total questions, presented one at a time with two buttons: "Yes" and "No". The first two questions and their responses must exactly match the user-provided text. After each answer, show the corresponding response message and allow proceeding to the next question.

After the quiz, add a "Game" button that reveals an animated, cute chibi dinosaur character holding a heart. Display the character intro dialogue as text exactly: "Hi my name is Luna as you know me hehehe so in this game u have tap 50 times in 15 second if you can do that you'll get this heart that I'm holding if you can't I'll cry" and provide a button to start the game.

Implement the tapping mini-game: user must register 50 taps within 15 seconds. The tapping area must support multi-finger input (i.e., multiple rapid taps on touchscreens). Show a visible countdown timer, tap counter, and clear success/failure result when time ends or goal is reached.

During the tapping game, on each tap, show a short floating feedback message chosen from a pool that includes at least these exact strings: "i ‚ù§Ô∏è u", "you can do it", "you almost there", "you did well", "proud of you". Add cute visual effects (e.g., small sparkles/heart pop) and a cherry-blossom petal overlay animation across the screen while the game is active.

After the game ends, show a heart button that reveals the full anniversary message. The revealed content must exactly match the user-provided text starting with: "Happy 21‚ù§Ô∏è Month Anniversary, my love ü§ç" and including the full multi-paragraph message as provided.
Update branding text across the site so any credit reading "created by caffeine ai" is replaced with the exact text: "created by Luna".

Reflect the requested website name "KBK&TC.com" in user-visible and browser metadata: set the app/site title to "KBK&TC.com" and display "KBK&TC.com" somewhere in the UI (e.g., small header/brand label).

Apply a cohesive romantic visual theme (not blue/purple): use a warm palette (e.g., blush pink, cream, soft red accents), gentle typography, and consistent button styling (heart motif) across Landing, Quiz, Game, and Final Message sections.

Add and use generated static image assets (placed under frontend/public/assets/generated) for: a chibi dino holding a heart, a small heart UI icon, and a cherry blossom petal sprite used for the petal overlay animation.

new_feature_requests.summary: Landing page with heading 'For my Love of my life Khambor B Kharjana', couple photo, and intro text with heart button to start questions
Interactive yes/no questionnaire (6‚Äì7 questions) with custom branching responses (e.g., 'do you love me' and 'worm' question)
Game section button that shows animated chibi dino character 'Luna' introducing the tap challenge
Tapping mini-game: reach 50 taps in 15 seconds, multi-finger support, tap feedback messages, cute effects, and cherry blossom petals overlay
Post-game heart button that reveals the full 'Happy 21 Month Anniversary' message content
Branding customization: replace 'created by caffeine ai' with 'created by Luna'
Set website URL/domain name to KBK&TC.com (domain/hosting configuration as applicable)

imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Chibi cute dinosaur holding a heart, pastel style, transparent background (luna-chibi-dino-heart.dim_1024x1024.png)
- Simple glossy heart icon/button graphic, transparent background (heart-button-icon.dim_512x512.png)
- Single cherry blossom petal sprite, soft pink, transparent background (cherry-blossom-petal.dim_256x256.png)
